subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

VIRGINIA TECH MASSACRE - REACTION FROM THE STARS
Hollywood's biggest stars tell Showbiz Tonight their
reaction to the horrifying news of the Virginia Tech shootings.
Jessica Biel, Julianne Moore, and Nicolas Cage give their
passionate views, on TV's most provocative entertainment news
show.

HOLLYWOOD AND VIOLENCE
In the wake of the
Virginia Tech massacre, Showbiz Tonight asks: does the violence
we see on TV and in the movies desensitize us to real-life
violence? Is it time to take a closer look at how much violence
we're exposed to? The provocative debate, on Showbiz Tonight.

THE DON IMUS CONTROVERSY: THE ROLE OF HIP HOP
After Don Imus' firing because of racist and sexist
comments, we're asking: is hip hop next? Is it different when
rappers use the kinds of words that got Imus fired? Hip hop
mogul Russell Simmons answers the tough questions, in the
interview you'll see only on Showbiz Tonight.

SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY: 
Violence and Hollywood: Is it
time to tone it down?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT.

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the
Question Of The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us
what you think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To
send your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your
video responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN
Headline Prime.
